text: Maren Ade (; born 12 December 1976) is a German movie director, screenwriter and producer. She teaches screenwriting at the Film Academy Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg in Ludwigsburg. She is known for directing and writing the Academy Award- nominated movie Toni Erdmann. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:German movie directors Category:German movie producers Category:German screenwriters
